name: RainNan
description:
Nanna Pru is cursed - or perhaps blessed - to have a raincloud follow her around wherever she goes. Use your raincloud to water flowers and avoid hydrophobic cats in this puzzle platformer.

Created for Untitled Game Jam #51. This is only a short game, made five levels before the end of the jam.

Game designed, developed and illustrated by Tom "Fluke" Bruno
